subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Yanic Perreault, Alex Steen and Jeff O’Neill scored in a shootout Friday night and the Toronto Maple Leafs denied Martin Brodeur his 40th victory by rallying to beat the Devils, 4-3.
snippet: Yanic Perreault, Alex Steen and Jeff O’Neill scored in a shootout Friday night and the Toronto Maple Leafs denied Martin Brodeur his 40th victory by rallying to beat the Devils, 4-3.
